'''Miniaturized Dice-Shaker''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Genius Invokation TCG (Achievement)|Genius Invokation TCG]]''. The achievements are earned by dealing 8 or more points of damage in one single action in victorious games of [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Trivia==
* The French name of the Achievement may be a reference to the 1989 American science-fiction film ''{{w|Honey, I Shrunk the Kids}}''.
